API Basics API Calls Field Reference for 3DPX APIs

Field Reference for 3DPX APIs

I. Model Metadata Fields for 3DPX “Read” API Calls

Field name Description Data Type
Title Model title String
Category field_model_category_tag Term reference
Model ID field_model_model_id Text
3D Model File field_model_3d_model_file URL (file)
DICOM File field_model_dicom_file URL (file)
DICOM Threshold field_model_dicom_threshold List (text)
Molecular Data File field_model_molecular_data_file URL (file)
Volumetric Data File field_model_volumetric_data_file URL (file)
Contour Level field_model_contour_level Text
Protein Data Bank ID field_model_pdb_id Text
Electron Microscopy Data Bank ID field_model_emdb_id Integer
Description field_model_description Long text and summary
Model image(s) field_model_model_images URL (file)
X3D field_model_x3d URL (file)
Keyword(s) field_model_keywords Term reference
Educational Use field_model_educational_use Boolean
Classroom Supplementals field_model_classroom_supplementals URL (file)
Model Color field_model_model_color Text
Model Origin field_model_model_origin Text
HTML field_model_html File
Experimental Method field_model_experimental_method Text
Organism Tag field_model_organism_tag Term reference
Associated Species field_model_associated_species Text
Sample field_model_sample Text
Molecular Weight field_model_molecular_weight Text
Resolution field_model_resolution Text
Resolution Units field_model_resolution_units Text
UniProt Reference Number field_model_uniprot_reference Text
Oligomeric Details field_model_oligometric_details Text
R-Factor field_model_r_factor Text
Scattering Type field_model_scattering_type Text
Contour Level field_model_contour_level Text
Medical or Scientific Field of Study field_model_field_of_study Text
Data Source field_model_data_source List (text)
X Dimension field_model_x_dimension Text
Y Dimension field_model_y_dimension Text
Z Dimension field_model_z_dimension Text
X Spacing field_model_x_spacing Text
Y Spacing field_model_y_spacing Text
Z Spacing field_model_z_spacing Text
Research Application field_model_research_application Text
Recommended 3D Printer(s) field_model_recommended_printers Text
Recommended Printing Material field_model_recommended_material Text
Recommended Support Material field_model_recommended_support Text
Print Units field_model_print_units Text
Scale at Given Print Units field_model_scale_at_print_units Text
Finishing Instructions field_model_finishing_instructions Long text
PubMed ID field_model_pubmed_id Integer
Digital Object Identifier (DOI) field_model_digital_object_id Text
Author(s) field_model_authors Text
Other Related Citation(s) field_model_other_related_cit Integer
Citation Title field_model_citation_title Text
Citation Year field_model_citation_year Text
Attribution Instructions field_model_attribution_instr Long text
Additional Model File(s) field_model_additional_3d_model URL (file)
Supplemental Documentation field_model_supplemental_doc URL (file)
URL path settings path Path module form elements
NIH Verified field_model_nih_verified Boolean
Terms and Conditions field_model_terms_and_conditions Boolean
Pipeline Log field_model_pipeline_log Long text
License field_model_ license Node reference
Download File(s) field_model_download_files URL (file)
Rating field_model_rating Fivestar Rating
Variation(s) field_model_variations Node reference
Quick Submit field_model_quick_submit Boolean
MoM Date field_model_mom_date Date
Link to MoM etnry field_model_pdb_mom_url Link
MoM Category field_model_mom_category Term reference

### II. Model Metadata Fields for 3DPX “Write” APIs The following fields are required for proper pipeline processing and/or organization within the repository, and should be included in any API-based model submissions.

Label Field Name Field Type
Title Title Node module element
Category field_model_category_tag Term reference
3D Model File field_model_3d_model_file File
DICOM File field_model_dicom_file File
Molecular Data File field_model_molecular_data_file File
Volumetric Data File field_model_volumetric_data_file File
Protein Data Bank ID field_model_pdb_id Text
Electron Microscopy Data Bank ID field_model_emdb_id Integer
Description field_model_description Long text and summary
Terms and Conditions field_model_terms_and_conditions Boolean
License field_model_ license Node reference
